mapper.select: select * from post where title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") and is_temp=#{isTemp}
mapper.insert: insert into post (did, uid, title, content, c_date, priority, cnt_like, is_temp) values (#{did}, #{uid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{cDate}, #{priority}, #{cntLike}, #{isTemp})
mapper.update: update user set email=#{email}, pwd=#{pwd}, nickname=#{nickname}, git_id=#{gitId}, git_url=#{gitUrl}, intro=#{intro}, img=#{img}, git_token=#{gitToken}, is_social=#{isSocial}, is_certified=#{isCertified} where id=#{id}
